title: Tekken 2
summary: Tekken 2[lower-alpha 1] is a fighting game, the second entry in the Tekken series. It was released in arcades in June 1995 and for the PlayStation in 1996. The original arcade version of the game was released in Tekken 5's Arcade History mode for the PlayStation 2, in 2007 for the PlayStation 3 and PlayStation Portable via the PlayStation Network and in 2009 for Zeebo.
